description.0: A longbow that was a gift from the Shogun. Eternal lightning crackles all around it.

0.0: Increases ATK by <cryo>20%</cryo> and grants the might of the Thunder Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Thunder Emblem increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>12/24/40%</cryo>. The character will obtain 1 stack of Thunder Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Skill (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.
